bank.topic: PDE03 - Modernizing Data Lakes and Data Warehouses with Google Cloud

entry.question: Which of the following statements are true? (Choose TWO)

option.detail: BigQuery is a row-based storage
Cloud SQL is optimized for high-read data
Cloud SQL is optimized for high-throughput writes
BigQuery is optimized for high-read data

entry.question: There are a number of common challenges encountered by data engineers. Which of the following approaches best address the challenge of data accuracy and quality?

option.detail: Consolidate disparate datasets and data formats into a data lake.
Optimize queries for performance
Manage server and cluster capacity and make sure that enough capacity exists to carry out the ETL jobs
Build ETL pipelines to clean and transform data that is then stored in a data warehouse.

entry.question: Which of the following statements on Cloud Storage are true?

option.detail: Cloud Storage allows you to set retention policies on all objects in a bucket
Cloud Storage simulates a file system
Cloud Storage implements both IAM policy and Access Control Lists
Data in Cloud Storage is not encrypted

entry.question: Which statement best describes a data lake?

option.detail: Storage optimized for high-throughput writes.
Storage for current/historical data intended for reporting.
The place where you capture every aspect of your business operations. Data is stored in its natural, raw format.
Data storage intended for analytics.

entry.question: Which of the following statements on BigQuery is incorrect?

option.detail: Data on BigQuery is physically stored in a redundant way separate from the compute cluster
Data is run length-encoded and dictionary-encoded
The number of slots allotted to a query is independent of query complexity
A BigQuery slot is a combination of CPU, memory, and networking resources

entry.question: True or False: ARRAYS can be a standalone field type or part of a STRUCTS field in BigQuery?

option.detail: False
True
